hd.text: $t(simulation, {'count': {{numSims}} }) performed to generate this high quality simulation

message.bulk: Bulk importing {{num}} pokemon, this may take a bit
message.deleteAll: Removing all Pokemon from your Pokebox
message.error: Oops, something went wrong. Try again in a couple seconds
message.newVersion: A new version is available, reload your browser

spinner.battle: Simulating combat results. This shouldn't take long
spinner.raid: Searching through all possible attackers to find the best counters. This shouldn't take long.
spinner.pokedex: Finding best attack matchups and counters. This might take a second.
spinner.rankings: Finding the best Pokemon by simulating combat between every single Pokemon matchup available. This will take a bit.

patreon.ad1: Pokebattler is doing an ad free trial. Please support us on Patreon to keep us ad free, get more Pokebox space, run more accurate sims, get more features and more!
patreon.ad2: Sign up for a free Patreon account and get 25 Pokebox spaces free. Simply log in using Patreon, no donation required.
patreon.ad3: Optimize your Raids. Sign up for Patreon for more accurate results and special features.
patreon.ad4: Love Pokebattler? Keep us going and ad free. Sign up for Patreon today and get more space, better results, exclusive tools and more.
patreon.ad5: Pokebattler is made possible by our Patreon supporters. Sign up for your free account today for 25 extra Pokebox slots.
patreon.ad6: Take your gaming to the next level with a Pokebattler Patreon account. Sign up now.

randomAssistants.title: Extra Random Trainers
randomAssistants.description: The number of additional random trainers to help you beat the boss. For tier 4 and 5 raid bosses, 5 random battle parties assist you with the fight by default.

explicitAssistants.title: Extra Trainers
explicitAssistants.description: The number of additional trainers to help you beat the boss. You choose the battle parties for each of these attackers
